WorkItem.Description: In today's raid environment, with all the additions of procs from trinkets/relics/talents/buffs, and with the coming information about the Crit% cap, it would be use full to see a snapshot of your stats if all your buffs are in full swing.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Snapshot of stats with full buffs proc'd

Comments.Message: This is currently standard. RAWR handles all procs as average over the entire fight. So if you have a trinket that procs for 300 SP for 20 seconds with a 60 second cd (hypothetically speaking) that would equate to an average SP uptime of 100 SP. Then RAWR will average that sp into your total Spell power.

There are some models that support this, DPSWarr added it for several stats in the main pane (in their tooltips). If you can confirm this is what you are looking for we can look into making it uniform across the models.
